# getWidget

Gets the specified widget.

```
GET /widgets/{id}
If-None-Match: (ifNotETag)
--- response
eTag: (eTag)
--- 200 OK
(widget)
--- 304 Not Modified
(if notModified)
```

| request | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | int32 | The widget ID. |
| ifNotETag | string | Don't get the widget if it has this ETag. |

| response | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| widget | [Widget](Widget.md) | The requested widget. |
| eTag | string | The ETag of the widget. |
| notModified | boolean | The widget still has the specified ETag. |
